basics.name: Jennifer Reddig
basics.label: Doctoral Student at Georgia Tech
basics.summary: Experienced technology professional with a Bachelor of Science (B.S.) focused in Mathematics from Lebanon Valley College. Computer Scientist with over a decade of Java programming experience. Undergraduate SQL and C++ experience in multiple projects. Graduate C and Python experience from Georgia Institute of Technology. Accomplished Computer Science Teacher with a demonstrated history of working in e-learning industry.

work.name: Georgia Institute of Technology
work.summary: Graduate Research Assistant with the Teachable AI Lab

work.name: Carnegie Learning
work.summary: Support and develop open source AB-testing software UpGrade. Manage and execute experiments with cognitive tutoring software MathIA using UpGrade and Pendo. Built teacher-designed live-learning tools with CMU's Learn Lab. Finalist in the US Department of Education's xPrize competition as Team UpGrade.

work.name: Vanguard
work.summary:
Site Reliability Engineer focused on observability and telemetry. Implemented REST endpoints for service health checks, AWS Lambdas for regular probing downstream services, DynamoDB to collect statuses, and used Angular to build a current status page.
Modernized Institutional Logon by upgrading UI to Angular 11 for compliance with accessibility review, implemented active/passive disaster recovery with AWS in us-east-1, us-east-2 and us-west-2.

work.name: Pennsylvania Leadership Charter School (PALCS)
work.summary: Teacher of Foundational Mathematics, Pre-Algebra, Honors Algebra II, and AP Computer Science A to high-achieving gifted students in a blended on-site/virtual environment. Developed a new applicant review system. MathCounts Coach. A cappella group “Algorhythms” director. School trip leader. Minecraft Club advisor. Dungeons and Dragons club advisor. FIRST Robotics assistant.

volunteer.summary: Tutored computer science concepts to bootcamp students in Python, Javascript, and SQL. Conducted mock technical interviews.

volunteer.position: Safer Spaces Chair and Volunteer Coordinator
volunteer.summary: Organizer for a weekly social swing dance. Coordinated volunteer schedules. Drafted safer spaces policy documents. Addressed anonymous concerns in a restorative justice approach.

courses: CS6200 - Graduate Introduction to Operating Systems
